author: Michael Writhe
name: confcoms
description: Config Commands loader. Enter your commands in a single config.json to add new response based commands.

commands.autowoot: We recommend PlugCubed for autowooting: http://plugcubed.net/
commands.ba: A Brand Ambassador is the voice of the plug.dj users. They promote events, engage the community and share the plug.dj message around the world. For more info: https://plug.dj/ba
commands.rcs: Radiant's RCS is a suite of tools to upgrade and enhance your plug.dj experience. Download it here: https://rcs.radiant.dj/ Direct USERSCRIPT link: https://code.radiant.mu/rs.user.js
